entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
